elements.description:
`<rmc-footer>` displays a footer at the bottom of the page.

In typical use, add the element to your body, and set the text attribute:

    <body>
      <rmc-footer text="Footer Text"></rmc-footer>

Class representing the footer.
elements.name: RMCFooter

elements.description:
Load the Polymer.Element base class

Class carousel.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Called after property values are set and local DOM is initialized.

elements.name: MyCarousel

elements.description:
`<rmc-jumbotron>` displays a jumbotron to showcase information.

In typical use, add the element to your body, and set the title, text, button,
and link attributes:

    <body>
        <rmc-jumbotron title="Title"
            text="Text"
            button="Button text"
            link="/path/"></rmc-jumbotron>

Class representing showcase.
elements.name: RMCJumbotron

elements.description:
`<rmc-markdown-info>` displays information about markdown syntax.

In typical use, add the element to your body:

    <body>
        <rmc-markdown-info></rmc-markdown-info>

Class representing information about markdown syntax.
elements.name: RMCMarkdownInfo

elements.description:
`<rmc-feature-cards>` displays a group of cards that highlight features.

In typical use, just add the element to your body:

    <body>
      <rmc-feature-cards></rmc-feature-cards>

Add the editable attribute to include features to edit card text content:

    <rmc-feature-cards editable></rmc-feature-cards>

Class representing feature cards.
elements.name: RMCFeatureCards

elements.description:
`<view-home>` is the view for the home page.

In typical use, add the element to an `<iron-pages>` element:

    <iron-pages
        selected="[[page]]"
        attr-for-selected="id"
        role="main">
        
        <view-home id="home"></view-home>
        ...
    </iron-pages>

Class representing home view.
elements.name: ViewHome

elements.description:
`<rmc-text-view>` displays text for a page.

In typical use, add the element to your body with the desired view:

    <body>
      <rmc-text-view view="about" title="About"></rmc-text-view>

Class representing text for a page.

properties.name: view
properties.description: The view that is being edited

params.name: e
params.description: on-tap event, 'service' attribute is the service to add.

elements.name: RMCTextView

attributes.name: view
attributes.description: The view that is being edited

elements.description:
`<rmc-manufacturing-services>` displays a list of manufacturing services.

In typical use, just add the element to your body:

    <body>
      <rmc-manufacturing-services></rmc-manufacturing-services>

Add the editable attribute to include features to edit the list:

    <rmc-manufacturing-services editable></rmc-manufacturing-services>

Class representing manufacturing services.

params.description: on-tap event, 'service' attribute is the service to add.

params.description: on-tap event, 'service' attribute is the service to delete.

elements.description:
`<rmc-equipment-list>` displays a table listing of machines.

In typical use, just add the element to your body:

    <body>
      <rmc-equipment-list></rmc-equipment-list>

Add the editable attribute to include features to edit the list:

    <rmc-equipment-list editable></rmc-equipment-list>

Class representing equipment list.

params.name: e
params.description: on-tap event, 'machine' attribute is the machine to add.

params.description: on-tap event, 'machine' attribute is the machine to delete.

elements.description:
`<rmc-tool-room-list>` displays a list of tool room equipment & services.

In typical use, just add the element to your body:

    <body>
      <rmc-tool-room-list></rmc-tool-room-list>

Add the editable attribute to include features to edit both lists:

    <rmc-tool-room-list editable></rmc-tool-room-list>

Class representing list of tool room equipment & services.

elements.description:
`<view-404>` is the view for a 404 page not found error.

In typical use, add the element to an `<iron-pages>` element:

    <iron-pages
        selected="[[page]]"
        attr-for-selected="id"
        fallback-selection="404"
        role="main">
        
        ...
        <view-404 id="404"></view-404>
    </iron-pages>

Class representing 404 page not found view.
